posts.content:
Aplogies for anybody who previously asked question on my bus, but the past few months have been a difficuly time for me. And now its finally over I need to sell the Bus!!!

Its a March 1955 Sweedish import, 11 window bus. Comes with original ribbed bumpers, and is painted in dove blue and lotus white.

Engine
LAP 2.1 type 4 lump, 2.0L crank and rods webcam 86a cam shaft Keith Black 96mm pistons, rebored L.A.P VW cylinders Dynamic balance on crank and flywheel ,front pulley , pressure plate, , end to end balance on rods, match weighted pistons L.A.P 44x38mm ported and flowed heads Uprated oil pump Full L.A.P Porsche 911 cooling fan, Turbo Thomas stainless exhaust system. Twin Webber 44IDF's, remote oil cooler and fan.
The bus was previously in the BWA with a time of 17.05, it still has plenty of power and will always put a smile on your face.

Transmission
1303’s gear box
Large trekker drive flanges
Custom heavy duty drive shafts
Porsche CV joints
LHD berg shifter

Suspension
CB performance 4inch narrowed beam, fully adjustable
T3d 3.5inch dropped spindles with new king and link pins
Porsche 944 rear IRS conversion
Kyb gas shoks

Brakes
Porsche 944 Front vented and grooved discs
Porsche 944 Rear vented discs
Porsche 944 master cylinder
Stainless flexi pipes

Original Porsche Fuchs 6x15 polished wheels

Comes with 6 bow creative roof rack and ladder, also has propex heater fitted to take the edge of those cold winter nights.

Electric hook up fitted, with battery charger/power unit.

Full width rock and roll bed, rear facing seat with storage underneath also mounted on this unit is a LCD TV mount. Overhead storage unit. Front bench seat covered in cream leather, rear seats covered in cream PVC type material.

Simpson lap seat belts fitted in the front, roof mounted 3 point seats belts on the rear bench seat.

In dash radio is not connected but was advised it worked, I have installed a clarion cd player under the dash tray, this is connected to an ipod dock with is situated in the ashtray.

7 Pin Detachabe towbar fitted

Speedo was recently calibrated and overhauled and is in MPH, I still have the original KPH unit if required, has an autometer rev counter fitted in the dash tray

Also comes with 2 Bluebird hammocks, these have been adapted so you can fit both in at the same time. So you can easily sleep 4 in there.

Only areas that need a bit of attention are both cargo doors have perspex windows in, ive had it for 5 years and have not yet got round to replacing!! Also the NSR jacking point could do with a bit of attention nothing bad though
Any questions please PM me or email me on mark.roxburgh@me.com , looking for offers around £22,000 as it needs to go to a new home

Stunning Bus - good luck with the sale

Bump

If I had the money Mark I would have it myself, I would love a 55 and mixed with a quick motor, stunnin
I remember seeing this bus in the flesh, absolutely awesome bus, good luck with the sale, someone is going to get a hell of a van
Love this bus can not believe you selling it dude

Thanks guys for the kind words, personally didn't think we would be selling it just yet, but things move on.

No rush on selling it until early next year, so. Can still get use out of it on the late sunny weekends until its gone.

Cheers

Mark
Have you advertised it on the samba, wider audience an all that

Wow!

I have just spend pretty much my entire lunch hour staring at this Bus! Has to be my favourite bus of all time!

I may have to talk sweetly (or plead!) with the wife tonight to have a second bus!!!!

dimdomdum wrote:Have you advertised it on the samba, wider audience an all that



Hi, that's the plan for the weekend

Cheers

I have just spend pretty much my entire lunch hour staring at this Bus! Has to be my favourite bus of all time!

I may have to talk sweetly (or plead!) with the wife tonight to have a second bus!!!!


Thanks glad you like it, we still get that feeling even after owning it for 5 years!!

I'm sure the next owner will enjoy it just as much

Now get working on the boss

Stunning bus, I have the Monster pro-stock race tacho which would compliment the engine in your bus which is a beaut.

Ron
Bump d bump bump
I hope my 55 turns out half as nice beautiful van well done pal worth every penny good luck with the sale
